statements: SELECT * FROM ClimateModelResults;
SELECT ModelName, Temperature, Humidity FROM ClimateModelResults WHERE Temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM ClimateModelResults WHERE Humidity < 60 ORDER BY ModelName ASC;
SELECT SimulationID, Humidity FROM ClimateModelResults WHERE WindSpeed > 10 ORDER BY SimulationID DESC;
SELECT ModelName, Temperature, WindSpeed FROM ClimateModelResults WHERE Temperature < 20 AND WindSpeed < 5;
SELECT * FROM ClimateModelResults ORDER BY SimulationID DESC, Temperature ASC, Humidity DESC, WindSpeed ASC;
SELECT ModelName, Temperature, Humidity FROM ClimateModelResults WHERE WindSpeed > 10 ORDER BY Temperature DESC;
SELECT ModelName, Temperature, Humidity, WindSpeed FROM ClimateModelResults WHERE Temperature >= 25 AND Humidity < 60 ORDER BY ModelName ASC;
SELECT SimulationID, ModelName, Temperature, Humidity, WindSpeed FROM ClimateModelResults WHERE Temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND Humidity <= 70 ORDER BY SimulationID ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateModelResults WHERE Temperature < 15 OR (Humidity >= 70 AND WindSpeed < 5) ORDER BY SimulationID DESC, Temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM climate_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM climate_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM climate_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM simulation_results WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT result_id, simulation_date, result_data FROM simulation_results ORDER BY simulation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM climate_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM climate_projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_description, simulation_date FROM climate_projects JOIN simulation_results ON climate_projects.project_id = simulation_results.project_id;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM climate_projects WHERE project_description LIKE '%environment%';
SELECT project_name, JSON_LENGTH(result_data) AS num_results FROM climate_projects JOIN simulation_results ON climate_projects.project_id = simulation_results.project_id ORDER BY num_results DESC;
SELECT model_name, simulation_date FROM ClimateModels;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects;
SELECT model_id, project_id, result_data FROM SimulationResults;
SELECT * FROM ClimateModels WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ResearchProjects WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ClimateModels;
SELECT model_name, simulation_date FROM ClimateModels WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT model_name, project_name, result_data FROM ClimateModels INNER JOIN SimulationResults ON ClimateModels.model_id = SimulationResults.model_id INNER JOIN ResearchProjects ON SimulationResults.project_id = ResearchProjects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM SimulationResults ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateModels;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM ClimateModels;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM ClimateModels WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SimulationRuns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM ResearchProjects;
SELECT * FROM ClimateModels;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM ClimateModels WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SimulationRuns WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ResearchProjects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT result_value FROM SimulationResults WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM climate_models;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_description FROM climate_models ORDER BY model_id DESC;
SELECT run_date, run_time, completed FROM simulation_runs WHERE completed = true;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM research_teams ORDER BY team_size ASC;
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM climate_models;
SELECT * FROM simulation_runs WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM research_teams WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT result_data FROM experiment_results WHERE result_date = '2022-09-15';
